potions.effect: Fortifies your hero's health by 5.
potions.description: Reignite the spark of life! This essential elixir heals sore muscles and headaches.

potions.effect: Fortifies your hero's health by 10.
potions.description: Reignite the spark of life! This essential elixir heals scrapes and bruises.

potions.effect: Fortifies your hero's health by 17.
potions.description: Reignite the spark of life! This essential elixir heals minor cuts.

potions.effect: Fortifies your hero's health by 30.
potions.description: Reignite the spark of life! This essential elixir heals broken bones and stems blood loss.

potions.effect: Fortifies your hero's health by 50.
potions.description: Reignite the spark of life! This essential elixir heals traumatic physical injury.

potions.effect: Fortifies your hero's health by 80.
potions.description: Reignite the spark of life! This uncanny elixir can bring you back from the brink of death.

potions.effect: Fortifies your hero's mana by 1.
potions.description: Taste the magic! This mystical mixture restores a mote of magical energy and willpower.

potions.effect: Fortifies your hero's mana by 2.
potions.description: Taste the magic! Restores enough energy to power minor cantrips and basic weapon attacks.

potions.effect: Fortifies your hero's mana by 3.
potions.description: Taste the magic! Restores enough energy to power signature spells and well-practiced combat moves.

potions.effect: Fortifies your hero's mana by 4.
potions.description: Taste the magic! Restores enough energy to power intricate incantations and fancy footwork.

potions.effect: Fortifies your hero's mana by 6.
potions.description: Taste the magic! Restores enough energy to power complex rituals and special attacks.

potions.effect: Fortifies your hero's mana by 8.
potions.description: Taste the magic! With this top-tier tincture, you'll be able to move mountains with your mind.

potions.effect: Allows your hero to retrieve 2 additional pieces of loot.
potions.description: Limitations are strictly optional. This strength-enhancing potion increases carrying capacity by a few pounds.

potions.effect: Allows your hero to retrieve 4 additional pieces of loot.
potions.description: Limitations are strictly optional. Enhances muscle fiber, allowing you to carry considerably more.

potions.effect: Allows your hero to retrieve 6 additional pieces of loot.
potions.description: Limitations are strictly optional. Reinforces muscles and skeletal structure, allowing you to carry significantly more.

potions.effect: Allows your hero to retrieve 8 additional pieces of loot.
potions.description: Limitations are strictly optional. Heightens strength to the natural limits of a peak athlete.

potions.effect: Allows your hero to retrieve 10 additional pieces of loot.
potions.description: Limitations are strictly optional. Bestows supernatural strength.

potions.effect: Allows your hero to retrieve 12 additional pieces of loot.
potions.description: Limitations are strictly optional. With this metabolic marvel, your upper limit is off the charts.

potions.effect: Reduces the time required to complete the current adventure by 1 time slot(s).
potions.description: Will you be the quick or the dead? This stimulating potion puts a bit of pep in your step.

potions.effect: Reduces the time required to complete the current adventure by 2 time slot(s).
potions.description: Will you be the quick or the dead? Allows you to sprint ahead of the competition.

potions.effect: Reduces the time required to complete the current adventure by 3 time slot(s).
potions.description: Will you be the quick or the dead? When you move like the wind, life is a breeze.

potions.effect: Reduces the time required to complete the current adventure by 4 time slot(s).
potions.description: Will you be the quick or the dead? Provides a shortcut to greatness. Blink and you'll miss it!

potions.effect: Reduces the time required to complete the current adventure by 5 time slot(s).
potions.description: Will you be the quick or the dead? Embrace your inner speed demon and get. It. Done.

potions.effect: Reduces the time required to complete the current adventure by 6 time slot(s).
potions.description: Will you be the quick or the dead? This masterful mixture lets you achieve terminal velocity.

potions.effect: Allows your hero to drink 2 more potions on their current adventure.
potions.description: There's always room for more potions. This fortifying potion helps to prevent an upset stomach.

potions.effect: Allows your hero to drink 3 more potions on their current adventure.
potions.description: There's always room for more potions. Allows you to overcome heartburn, bloating, and unforeseen side effects from mixing potions.

potions.effect: Allows your hero to drink 4 more potions on their current adventure.
potions.description: There's always room for more potions. Shores up your body's overall resilience, allowing for multiple potion effects.

potions.effect: Allows your hero to drink 5 more potions on their current adventure.
potions.description: There's always room for more potions. Increases your constitution, allowing you to imbibe a significant volume.

potions.effect: Allows your hero to drink 6 more potions on their current adventure.
potions.description: There's always room for more potions. Expands your stomach so that you can imbibe far beyond your normal capacity.

potions.effect: Allows your hero to drink 7 more potions on their current adventure.
potions.description: There's always room for more potions. This masterwork allows you to enjoy the benefits of a cast-iron stomach.

potions.effect: Blocks 3 points of fire damage to your hero.
potions.description: The world's on fire. Don't get burned! This tonic provides resistance to the heat AND the humidity.

potions.effect: Blocks 5 points of fire damage to your hero.
potions.description: The world's on fire. Don't get burned! Grants protection from sunburn and heat stroke.

potions.effect: Blocks 8 points of fire damage to your hero.
potions.description: The world's on fire. Don't get burned! Provides resistance to first- and second-degree burns.

potions.effect: Blocks 12 points of fire damage to your hero.
potions.description: The world's on fire. Don't get burned! Provides resistance to third-degree burns (but it won't save your eyebrows).

potions.effect: Blocks 20 points of fire damage to your hero.
potions.description: The world's on fire. Don't get burned! Grants fleeting protection against fireball spells and lava.

potions.effect: Blocks 35 points of fire damage to your hero.
potions.description: The world's on fire. Don't get burned! This top-tier tonnic makes you temporarily fireproof.

potions.effect: Blocks 3 points of ice damage to your hero.
potions.description: Don't let life give you the cold shoulder. This tonic provides resistance to snowball damage.

potions.effect: Blocks 5 points of ice damage to your hero.
potions.description: Don't let life give you the cold shoulder. Takes the edge off a chill wind.

potions.effect: Blocks 8 points of ice damage to your hero.
potions.description: Don't let life give you the cold shoulder. Lessens damage taken from projectile icicles.

potions.effect: Blocks 12 points of ice damage to your hero.
potions.description: Don't let life give you the cold shoulder. Prevents hypothermia.

potions.effect: Blocks 20 points of ice damage to your hero.
potions.description: Don't let life give you the cold shoulder. Makes a blizzard feel like a day in the park.

potions.effect: Blocks 35 points of ice damage to your hero.
potions.description: Don't let life give you the cold shoulder. Shrug off frostbite with the best elemental protection that money can buy.

potions.effect: Blocks 3 points of thunder damage to your hero.
potions.description: Stay grounded when life brings the thunder. This tonic protects you from static shocks.

potions.effect: Blocks 5 points of thunder damage to your hero.
potions.description: Stay grounded when life brings the thunder. Allows you to endure minor voltage.

potions.effect: Blocks 8 points of thunder damage to your hero.
potions.description: Stay grounded when life brings the thunder. Provides protection from larger jolts.

potions.effect: Blocks 12 points of thunder damage to your hero.
potions.description: Stay grounded when life brings the thunder. Provides resistance to lightning, both magical and mundane.

potions.effect: Blocks 20 points of thunder damage to your hero.
potions.description: Stay grounded when life brings the thunder. Insulates you against sustained electrical currents.

potions.effect: Blocks 35 points of thunder damage to your hero.
potions.description: Stay grounded when life brings the thunder. Enjoy near-total immunity to shock damage with this masterful potion.

potions.effect: Blocks 3 points of shadow damage to your hero.
potions.description: Things going bump in the night? Bump right back. Like bottled sunshine, this tonic provides mild resistance to elemental shadow.

potions.effect: Blocks 5 points of shadow damage to your hero.
potions.description: Things going bump in the night? Bump right back. Protects against vitality-sapping spells.

potions.effect: Blocks 8 points of shadow damage to your hero.
potions.description: Things going bump in the night? Bump right back. Defends against fear-inducing spells.

potions.effect: Blocks 12 points of shadow damage to your hero.
potions.description: Things going bump in the night? Bump right back. Shores up your resistance to vile necromancy.

potions.effect: Blocks 20 points of shadow damage to your hero.
potions.description: Things going bump in the night? Bump right back. Provides divine protection against undead and supernatural foes.

potions.effect: Blocks 35 points of shadow damage to your hero.
potions.description: Things going bump in the night? Bump right back. With total immunity to dark magic, the only thing to fear in the dark... will be you.

potions.effect: Blocks 3 points of radiation damage to your hero.
potions.description: Fear no fallout. This protective potion blocks the effects of background radiation.

potions.effect: Blocks 5 points of radiation damage to your hero.
potions.description: Fear no fallout. Lets you dip a toe into irradiated regions.

potions.effect: Blocks 8 points of radiation damage to your hero.
potions.description: Fear no fallout. Protects against the short-term effects of radiation poisoning.

potions.effect: Blocks 12 points of radiation damage to your hero.
potions.description: Fear no fallout. Prevents radiation sickness and sudden bouts of mutation.

potions.effect: Blocks 20 points of radiation damage to your hero.
potions.description: Fear no fallout. Grants protection against irradiated beasts and death rays.

potions.effect: Blocks 35 points of radiation damage to your hero.
potions.description: Fear no fallout. First-rate hazmat shielding prevents magical radiation from ruining your day, even at ground zero.

potions.effect: Increases the change that your hero will retrieve extra loot from any monster or hazard by 10%
potions.description: Keep your eyes on the prize. This corrective potion compensates for mino vision defects.

potions.effect: Increases the change that your hero will retrieve extra loot from any monster or hazard by 15%
potions.description: Keep your eyes on the prize. Temporarily corrects nearsightedness, farsightedness, and astigmatism.

potions.effect: Increases the change that your hero will retrieve extra loot from any monster or hazard by 25%
potions.description: Keep your eyes on the prize. Enhances vision slightly beyond human norms.

potions.effect: Increases the change that your hero will retrieve extra loot from any monster or hazard by 35%
potions.description: Keep your eyes on the prize. Grants telescopic and microscopic vision.

potions.effect: Increases the change that your hero will retrieve extra loot from any monster or hazard by 50%
potions.description: Keep your eyes on the prize. Bestows infrared vision, increasing perception by a great degree.

potions.effect: Increases the change that your hero will retrieve extra loot from any monster or hazard by 75%
potions.description: Keep your eyes on the prize. Find a needle in a haystack at a hundred yards with this unrivaled sight-enhancing concoction.

potions.effect: Increases the change that your hero will retrieve ingredients with good traits by 10%.
potions.description: Roll for initiative. This galvanizing potion grants a trivial boost to focus.

potions.effect: Increases the change that your hero will retrieve ingredients with good traits by 15%.
potions.description: Roll for initiative. Provides relief from persistent distractions.

potions.effect: Increases the change that your hero will retrieve ingredients with good traits by 25%.
potions.description: Roll for initiative. Amplifies the drinker's mental concentration.

potions.effect: Increases the change that your hero will retrieve ingredients with good traits by 35%.
potions.description: Roll for initiative. Enhances awareness beyond the average baseline of your species.

potions.effect: Increases the change that your hero will retrieve ingredients with good traits by 50%.
potions.description: Roll for initiative. Become a parangon of focus—and impervious to unwelcome surprises.

potions.effect: Increases the change that your hero will retrieve ingredients with good traits by 75%.
potions.description: Roll for initiative. Finding what you're looking for is easy with the mystic metaconsciousness this potion provides.

potions.effect: Increases the change that your hero will retrieve rarer ingredients by 10%.
potions.description: Wisdom in a bottle. This perception-boosting potion bestows a bit of savvy.

potions.effect: Increases the change that your hero will retrieve rarer ingredients by 15%.
potions.description: Wisdom in a bottle. Increases perception and investigative acumen.

potions.effect: Increases the change that your hero will retrieve rarer ingredients by 25%.
potions.description: Wisdom in a bottle. Grants a more refined level of discernment.

potions.effect: Increases the change that your hero will retrieve rarer ingredients by 35%.
potions.description: Wisdom in a bottle. Boosts your understanding of nature and other complex systems.

potions.effect: Increases the change that your hero will retrieve rarer ingredients by 50%.
potions.description: Wisdom in a bottle. Sharpens insight to a supernatural degree.

potions.effect: Increases the change that your hero will retrieve rarer ingredients by 75%.
potions.description: Wisdom in a bottle. This potent concoction pries open your third eye, laying bare secrets both natural and arcane.

potions.effect: Increases the change that your hero will retrieve multi-magimin ingredients by 10%.
potions.description: Follow your gut. This instinct-boosting potion makees you feel a tickle in the presence of magic.

potions.effect: Increases the change that your hero will retrieve multi-magimin ingredients by 15%.
potions.description: Follow your gut. Allows you to feel a subtle tug toward nearby magical items.

potions.effect: Increases the change that your hero will retrieve multi-magimin ingredients by 25%.
potions.description: Follow your gut. Grants an unmistakable pull toward objects of magical purpose.

potions.effect: Increases the change that your hero will retrieve multi-magimin ingredients by 35%.
potions.description: Follow your gut. Leads you right to magical loot, if it's not too far away.

potions.effect: Increases the change that your hero will retrieve multi-magimin ingredients by 50%.
potions.description: Follow your gut. Become a compass for quality, always knowing where to look for high concentrations of magic.

potions.effect: Increases the change that your hero will retrieve multi-magimin ingredients by 75%.
potions.description: Follow your gut. This peerless potion makes you a veritable magnet for items of magical puissance.

potions.effect: Increases the change that your hero will retrieve  ingredients containing rarer magimins by 10%.
potions.description: Seek, and you shall find. This sought-after potion gives a mystical hunch about where to find misplaced keys, lost socks, and more.

potions.effect: Increases the change that your hero will retrieve  ingredients containing rarer magimins by 15%.
potions.description: Seek, and you shall find. Sends vague dreams and premonitions about the location of coveted items.

potions.effect: Increases the change that your hero will retrieve  ingredients containing rarer magimins by 25%.
potions.description: Seek, and you shall find. Bestows a supernatural intuition to help you find what you crave.

potions.effect: Increases the change that your hero will retrieve  ingredients containing rarer magimins by 35%.
potions.description: Seek, and you shall find. Confers a robust sixth sense to guide you on a successful hunt.

potions.effect: Increases the change that your hero will retrieve  ingredients containing rarer magimins by 50%.
potions.description: Seek, and you shall find. Full-blown clairvoyance makes questing a foregone conclusion.

potions.effect: Increases the change that your hero will retrieve  ingredients containing rarer magimins by 75%.
potions.description: Seek, and you shall find. Gaze through the mists of time to unfailingly locate the objects of your desire!

potions.effect: Empowers your hero to overcome level 1 poison hazards.
potions.description: Avoid a toxic lifestyle. This cure makes you queasy, but it provides minor protection against the poisoned effect.

potions.effect: Empowers your hero to overcome level 2 poison hazards.
potions.description: Avoid a toxic lifestyle. Makes your immune system a little more robust.

potions.effect: Empowers your hero to overcome level 3 poison hazards.
potions.description: Avoid a toxic lifestyle. Protects against ingested poisons, making mealtime a little less stressful.

potions.effect: Empowers your hero to overcome level 4 poison hazards.
potions.description: Avoid a toxic lifestyle. Protects against venom from spiders, snakes and other creepy crawlies.

potions.effect: Empowers your hero to overcome level 5 poison hazards.
potions.description: Avoid a toxic lifestyle. Protects against the venom of magical beasts.

potions.effect: Empowers your hero to overcome level 6 poison hazards.
potions.description: Avoid a toxic lifestyle. This best-in-class potion functions like a universal, preventive antivenom.

potions.effect: Empowers your hero to overcome level 1 magical sleep hazards.
potions.description: Rise and shine! This potion provides a mild caffeine buzz, protecting somewhat against magical sleep effects.

potions.effect: Empowers your hero to overcome level 2 magical sleep hazards.
potions.description: Rise and shine! Provides a jolt of wakefulness, at the expense of mild jitters.

potions.effect: Empowers your hero to overcome level 3 magical sleep hazards.
potions.description: Rise and shine! Works better than a bucket of water to the face.

potions.effect: Empowers your hero to overcome level 4 magical sleep hazards.
potions.description: Rise and shine! Dispels drowsiness and prevents hypnosis and mind control.

potions.effect: Empowers your hero to overcome level 5 magical sleep hazards.
potions.description: Rise and shine! Promises a bout of insomnia in every bottle.

potions.effect: Empowers your hero to overcome level 6 magical sleep hazards.
potions.description: Rise and shine! This superlative cure makes sleep temporarily impossible.

potions.effect: Empowers your hero to overcome level 1 petrification hazards.
potions.description: Stay limber! This potion provides some protection against the petrified status, but it can cause dandruff.

potions.effect: Empowers your hero to overcome level 2 petrification hazards.
potions.description: Stay limber! This potion shortens the petrification effect by loosening the muscles.

potions.effect: Empowers your hero to overcome level 3 petrification hazards.
potions.description: Stay limber! Like yoga in a bottle, this potion keeps you flexible.

potions.effect: Empowers your hero to overcome level 4 petrification hazards.
potions.description: Stay limber! This cure provides all the benefits of a deep-tissue massage.

potions.effect: Empowers your hero to overcome level 5 petrification hazards.
potions.description: Stay limber! Provides reliable protection against gorgons and basilisks. Also helps with arthritis!

potions.effect: Empowers your hero to overcome level 6 petrification hazards.
potions.description: Stay limber! This monumental mixture enhances muscle tone and flexibility so that you can be statuesque, not statuary.

potions.effect: Empowers your hero to overcome level 1 magical silence hazards.
potions.description: Get ready to make some noise! This potion offers mild protection against magical silencing. (May cause excess salivation.)

potions.effect: Empowers your hero to overcome level 2 magical silence hazards.
potions.description: Get ready to make some noise! Helps you whistle and hum on tune, even in a magical zone of silence.

potions.effect: Empowers your hero to overcome level 3 magical silence hazards.
potions.description: Get ready to make some noise! Allows your whispers to be heard at a distance.

potions.effect: Empowers your hero to overcome level 4 magical silence hazards.
potions.description: Get ready to make some noise! Amplifies the volume of your voice exponentially.

potions.effect: Empowers your hero to overcome level 5 magical silence hazards.
potions.description: Get ready to make some noise! Emboldens you to speak your truth, free of tongue-tied timidness.

potions.effect: Empowers your hero to overcome level 6 magical silence hazards.
potions.description: Get ready to make some noise! With this eloquence-enhancing elixir, you'll never be silenced again.

potions.effect: Empowers your hero to overcome level 1 curse hazards.
potions.description: Your luck's about to change. This potion provides some protection against the cursed effect (but can't cure clumsiness).

potions.effect: Empowers your hero to overcome level 2 curse hazards.
potions.description: Your luck's about to change. Provides protection against lesser jinxes.

potions.effect: Empowers your hero to overcome level 3 curse hazards.
potions.description: Your luck's about to change. Provides protection against the evil eye.

potions.effect: Empowers your hero to overcome level 4 curse hazards.
potions.description: Your luck's about to change. Provides protection against full-blown hexes.

potions.effect: Empowers your hero to overcome level 5 curse hazards.
potions.description: Your luck's about to change. Provides protection against major maledictions and inherited curse.

potions.effect: Empowers your hero to overcome level 6 curse hazards.
potions.description: Your luck's about to change. Rewrite the rules of reality with a potion that lets you purify spells of evil intent.
